description:
misc/vim: update installation instructions to work better with some Linux distributions.

Fixes issue 3308.

messages.text:
https://codereview.appspot.com/7301086/diff/5001/misc/vim/readme.txt
File misc/vim/readme.txt (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7301086/diff/5001/misc/vim/readme.txt#newcode10
misc/vim/readme.txt:10: set runtimepath+=$GOROOT/misc/vim
On 2013/02/13 16:35:28, minux wrote:
> most people won't set GOROOT these days,
> we need a better way.

Sure, but hopefully people can figure that out if they are reading this file and put in the path to the right directory.

On Thursday, February 14, 2013, dsymonds wrote:
>
> Sure, but hopefully people can figure that out if they are reading this
> file and put in the path to the right directory.
>
sure. this is better that the old instruction. LGTM.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

https://codereview.appspot.com/7301086/diff/5001/misc/vim/readme.txt

most people won't set GOROOT these days,
we need a better way.
